Transparency in GMO Detection

GMO Detectives is a startup committed to revolutionizing GMO detection using new technologies.

Our Mission

To empower consumers with transparent insights about GMO content in their products.

Our Vision

To place a global standard for GMO detection, towards a more transparent food industry.

The Team



Sarai is a PhD Candidate and the CEO of GMO Detectives. With over a decade of experience in molecular biology and bioinformatics, she has spent the last four years specializing in the development of cutting-edge methods for GMO detection. Sarai is dedicated to translating her research into actionable solutions, providing the market with reliable and precise GMO detection services.
